ComicInfo.Summary: Pentagram of Horror is a new horror anthology with each issue being a stand-alone story. My Own Hell explores the anxiety, self-doubts, and profound desire for recognition endured by every creative. In our tale, when the desire for worldly acclaim becomes all-consuming, it leads a young man to part with that which he should have prized most dearly. All too late, he finds that a blind pursuit of recognition can strip its victim of their physical and mental health, and sometimesâ€¦ even their very soul.
